body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for contacting Henderson Autos, this is Charles Henderson. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Deborah. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I am frustrated because I found out the inventory numbers were off by two hundred units.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I apologize for the inconvenience. Can you please provide me with your phone number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five zero eight, eight five five, two three four one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And can you also confirm your address for us to update our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Certainly, my address is one two three Main Street, Cityville, State.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Deborah. We will work to resolve the inventory discrepancy. Is there anything else you would like to add?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that covers it. Thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Deborah. We appreciate your feedback and will address the issue promptly. Have a great day!
